alert.note: Alert for Emanuel (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Emanuel County through 215 PM EDT... At 151 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lexsy, or 8 miles south of Swainsboro, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Twin City, Garfield, Nunez, Lexsy and George L Smith State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
